name: Kaan Boyacı
title: Web Developer
about:
"I'm Kaan, a passionate full-stack and backend web developer. I specialize in building scalable web applications and designing efficient server-side architecture.

I have a strong command of programming languages such as JavaScript, PHP, and I'm proficient in frameworks like Node.js, React.js, Express.js and Laravel I enjoy collaborating with teams to deliver high-quality code and finding innovative solutions to complex problems.

If you're looking for a dedicated web developer who can bring your ideas to life and create impactful online experiences, I'd love to connect. Let's build something amazing together!"
